header.title: The Corruption Of Capitalism In America

title: The Corruption Of Capitalism In America
content:
Quick comment on the government shut-down and debt ceiling fiasco. <!--more--> We are witnessing what David Stockman calls the failure of the American state itself.
It is careening wildly into dysfunction and incontinence.
Vast sums of money transferred from the have-nots to the haves.
The greatest heist of all time.
The Federal Reserve is behind it all.
There is no good reason for this and no possible positive outcome for the country.
I describe in graphic detail the scandalous ‘money-drops’ to favored institutions and financial organizations and the so-called “reasoning” behind the fund movements.
Why is the Prime Minister of Malaysia critical of the TPP but America seems to take it lying down?
Both countries are equally disadvantaged by this so-called “trade agreement” which is nothing of the sort.
Third quarter earnings reporting season has just begun and the results are grim.
Beggars now need permits in Middle Township, NJ.
Failure to possess one will incur the unfortunate beggar in a $250 fine.
How delightfully humane!
The Defense Department is ordering hundreds of millions of dollars-worth of equipment it doesn’t need.
We all know why (don’t we?
).
